Reviews.Title: “small, convenient, quite but with bed bugs”
Reviews.Author: dahdane
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the City plus hostel for 3 nights. although, one cannot expect a spacious accommodation from a cheap price but it surely served the purpose. we were only there to sleep. the bed was comfortable enough, the shower (hot and cold) was working, the aircon was functional. The WORST part was that, there were BED BUGS!!!! At first, I noticed only one bug crawling....but later that night, my roommate saw more bugs crawling everywhere...she spent many hours searching for the other bugs and trying to kill them. we informed Dina, but she insisted that it could have come from us. Though she sprayed some insect repellent but it did not solve the problem. we ended up coming home with red rashes....bite marks from the BED BUGS!

Reviews.Title: “Receptionist stole from us”
Reviews.Author: M J B
Reviews.Content: On our last morning, we told friendly receptionist Dina we'd check out after breakfast. My new expensive Bose headphones were the only valuable thing we left in the room. Later, we discovered they were missing and, in front of her in the office, we unpacked our bags three times and thoroughly re-checked the tiny room twice. Absolutely not there. Gone. Dina said, "Maybe I'll find them when I clean your room." When we picked up our bags hours later, Dina said, "Here. I saw them right away on the shelf." Believe us, they were not on the shelf. We are convinced she took them. She must've felt guilty and returned them to us. Wow.

Reviews.Title: “Small but clean”
Reviews.Author: animonina
Reviews.Content: Just like any other hostels in HK, the rooms are small with very little moving space. But since you only use it to sleep, then it's okay. Showing is a little bit tricky, as the bathroom/toilet is proportionally small too, maybe just 1.5-2 sqm. :) But cleanliness is a top priority, our room was cleaned everyday and the Filipina receptionist (Dina) is very helpful and even taught us how to get around HK in a cheaper way. We also bought the attaction tickets for her. Location is very, very good, it's close to the Mong Kok MTR station, bus stops and just across Ladies' Market. There are also some nearby food chains like McDo, BurgerKIng and CDC.

Reviews.Title: “Right smack in the action of Mongkok”
Reviews.Author: faburo
Reviews.Content: I was at HK last weekend, stayed at Cityplus for 3 nights with a big group. I must say for a group that is loves to stay outdoors to enjoy the city, this place is just about okay. What I liked: location. near the night market and the mtr stations. very accessible by bus. Ate Dina's helping hand! What I didnt: the heater was not working in our room. the elevators take a while. cable channels very very few. Overall, the place served our purpose well.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel right in the heart of the city”
Reviews.Author: Ozpinoy1
Reviews.Content: My family and i stayed for 4 nights, since the hostel was located in the city and had access to the MTR, buses to the airport. Staff were always friendly and was always helpful in giving you directions to Hong Kong's tourist destinations. Place is ideal for would be shoppers and acessibility to transportation around the city. With these perks, i would say its value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Simple, clean, central.”
Reviews.Author: manuscr1pt
Reviews.Content: city plus offers the cleaner, quieter version of the chung king rat boxes down nathan road. the service is capable but pretty non-existent, which i found to be no bother because the linen was clean, the hot water worked and the wifi (in-room!) worked. at HK$250/night, a private single here is the best deal i found. it's certainly no frills, but no complaints either.

Reviews.Title: “Very tiny room. Noisy at times. But excellent location.”
Reviews.Author: lauriiie
Reviews.Content: The double room en-suite at City Plus is very very small. No window. If you and your partner travel with many suitcases, it's not the place to go. Backpackers will find it okay, but you cannot really walk in the room. The mini bathroom is functional, but you might struggle if you are tall (to sit on the toilet, for example!). Quite cramped, but the ceilings are high. You can literally touch all the 4 walls of the double room en-suite at the same time! We paid around 40 $CAN for the room, but i cannot compare it to others in the same area. However, the location, next to Mong Kok station, is excellent. A lot of action, shops and restaurants all around. We stayed there for 4 nights, slept well for 2. The bed was comfortable enough, but again, if you are tall, you might not fit in. The duvet is also too small for the bed. The doors seem to be made out of cardboard : you can here everything in the hallway. The lady at the reception was however very nice and helpful. They have only one computer to use for free.

Reviews.Title: “Helpful Staff, friendly owner, clean place, small bathroom”
Reviews.Author: vema123
Reviews.Content: I & my mom stayed at City Plus Hostel in Mongkok, Hong Kong. The place is clean, though the bathroom is too small. HOwever the owner (a Chinese Indonesian guy) is very friendly. We stayed there for 1 night before we left for China the next day. As we returned fm China & planned to stay there again, it was fully booked (it was my mistake as I hadn't made any reservation for my second visit), but his staff (may be Dina?) was very helpful and she even let me borrow the hotel's telephone with NO CHARGE AT ALL so that we could manage to find another guest house. Without her help, we had no idea how to phone around the guest houses in HK in the evening, moreover when I was traveling with my elderly mom with heavy suitcases.

Reviews.Title: “Small place but clean”
Reviews.Author: slazenger552
Reviews.Content: This hostel has small rooms but very clean. Dina, the staff who does everything was so accommodating and helpful. It was winter and I felt very cold so she let me borrow a fleas jacket and I was able to go and stroll in Disneyland. Thanks Ate Dina. I will be back here again someday or maybe June 2011. Try to see www.cityplushostel.com

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: lisa_elisa
Reviews.Content: me and my friends stay for 3 days.very clean.comfortable.the bathroom so small, but have hot shower,for me is good enough.ms.dina (staff) really nice,helpful and very good in english. for me, my stay here is 3 out 5 stars. highly recommended.
